subject: Preakness Stakes
Belmont Stakes
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Long before Street Sense,  trainer Carl Nafzger proved he knew how to win the Kentucky Derby. The Preakness and the Belmont, however, have tripped him up.
snippet: Long before Street Sense,  trainer Carl Nafzger proved he knew how to win the Kentucky Derby. The Preakness and the Belmont, however, have tripped him up.
